main.name: Urvashi Dave
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe Code
main.bio: Urvashi is a certified ScumMaster® (CSM®) software professional with 6 years of compelling experience in delivering high-quality digital user web experiences using Enterprise object oriented programming, UI/UX, e-commerce, Web and back-end technologies like React JS, Javascript (ES6,ES5), PHP, REST API, HTML5, CSS, MsSQL and LINUX Scripting using agile and DevOps principles. She also enjoys learning and employing new disruptive technologies such as cloud, DevOps and new front-end frameworks.

education.degree: Post Graduation, Internet Programming & Database management

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Design and implement flyer distribution system for medium and large retailers using web technologies such as PHP, Angular Javascript, React Javascript, HTML, CSS, SQL Server (MsSQL) and Restful API, using UI/UX principles. Create responsive geographical data plotting for targeted marketing analysis using Google Maps API, Here Maps API,D3 API (D3.js) and Highcharts API. Develop analytical insights and PDF reports for effective marketing campaigns using HTML, CSS, Javascript, AJAX, JQuery, JSON and MySQL. Incorporate Search Engine Optimization (SEO) service to improve the visibility of Market-Focus company and it's retailer clients' websites.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Built responsive mobile-friendly websites for public sector clients using Wordpress and PHP. Maintained in-house websites and high-quality codes using A/B testing and peer code review. Ensured technical feasibility of UI/UX designs using Front-end technologies, provided user support and toubleshooting as L4 support.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Develop and maintain application code, web pages and content including graphics, documents and text, for Company website using technologies like Codigniter, Javascript, CSS, MYSQL.

work.title: Web,Database Developer
work.description: Developed responsive web portal TMS6 (Terminal Management System) using PHP, Linux Scripting, Javascript, and MySql to manage inventory and status of multiple petrochemical facilities. Performed requirement gathering, code development and testing of Web Portal that manages the data and views the data of the gas station terminals. Built scripts in Linux scrpts to retrieve data from the MySQL and generated reports according to client requirements.
